dialogs.text: A new day begins ‚Äî and that email invitation still waits in your inbox. But this time, instead of nervousness, there‚Äôs a flicker of curiosity.

Three avatars fade in ‚Äî one at a time, each with their own personality and color theme.

Next appears Kenji ‚Äî the Developer ‚Äî his avatar framed by lines of cascading code.
Sup. I‚Äôm Kenji ‚Äî I code stuff. I‚Äôm not great at talking, but give me a bug, and I‚Äôll squash it faster than you can say ‚Äòruntime error‚Äô.

The coder‚Äôs rather stoic lips that were forming a flat line curl into a soft smile.

Lastly appears Maya ‚Äî the Presenter ‚Äî standing confidently with a glowing mic in hand.
Hiya! I‚Äôm Maya ‚Äî the storyteller. My job? Convince the judges that our idea changes the world.

I get it now‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs not just about who‚Äôs smartest. It‚Äôs about combining strengths.
